授業方法: All classes are expected to be taught face-to-face. Google Classroom will be used for some course information and assignment submissions. Therefore, students will NEED access to a computer at home or use a school computer lab to be able to properly complete and submit assignments. Desktop, laptop, notebook, Macbook, etc, are fine. Students should also have a Google account and sign up for Google Drive and Google Classroom (both are free).Learners who miss tests and do not have an official absence will not have any opportunity to retake the test.------This course is taught in English. Students should communicate with the teacher in English. Assignments may require the use of a computer and online sites.Additionally, this class includes collaboration and regular pairwork. All members are expected to support each other.
